PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2017-09702017-06-23,  ,  IRCC,  , 
ActImmigration and Refugee Protection Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations (Temporary Resident Visa Exemptions)
PrecisRegulations Amending the IMMIGRATION AND REFUGEE PROTECTION REGULATIONS (TEMPORATY RESIDENT VISA EXEMPTIONS) in order to remove Antigua and Barbuda from the list of visa-exempt countries to protect the safety and security of Canadians and uphold Canada’s commitment to secure the North American perimeter.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2017-0147 Publication Date: 2017-07-12
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations (Temporary Resident Visa Exemptions)
precis: Regulations Amending the IMMIGRATION AND REFUGEE PROTECTION REGULATIONS (TEMPORATY RESIDENT VISA EXEMPTIONS) in order to remove Antigua and Barbuda from the list of visa-exempt countries to protect the safety and security of Canadians and uphold Canada’s commitment to secure the North American perimeter.
